termsAndConditions.title: Service contract
termsAndConditions.subtitle: Flizbar Terms and Conditions of Use
termsAndConditions.welcomeText: Welcome to Flizbar! By registering, you agree to the following terms and conditions of use:
termsAndConditions.firstTerm: 1. Flizbar is a market capital-based financial management platform.
termsAndConditions.secondTerm: 2. The user is responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their password and account.
termsAndConditions.thirdTerm: 3. Using the platform for illegal or unauthorized activities is prohibited.
termsAndConditions.fourthTerm: 4. Flizbar reserves the right to terminate accounts that violate these terms.
termsAndConditions.fifthTerm: 5. Continued use of the platform implies acceptance of possible changes to the terms.
termsAndConditions.sixthTerm: 6. Flizbar is not responsible for financial losses arising from the use of the platform.
termsAndConditions.seventhTerm: 7. Information provided by the user must be accurate and truthful.
termsAndConditions.eighthTerm: 8. You agree to receive electronic communications from Flizbar.
termsAndConditions.ninthTerm: 9. All user data is treated in accordance with Flizbar's privacy policy.
termsAndConditions.tenthTerm: 10. If you have any questions, please contact support.
